text: anriyum evarkal tankalai, "niccayamaka nankal kiristavarkal" enru kurikkolkirarkalo avarkalitamiruntum nam urutimoli vankinom;. Anal avarkalum avarkalukku valankappattirunta potanaiyin (perum) pakutiyai marantu vittarkal;. Akave, iruti nal varai avarkalitaiye pakaimaiyum, veruppum nilaikkac ceytom;. Innum, avarkal ceytu kontiruntavai parri allah avarkalukku etuttuk kattuvan
